---
title: "Trixi User and Developer Interaction (TRUDI) Workshop 2026"
---

![](assets/trixi.png){fig-alt="Trixi logo" width=220}

**16–20 March 2026 · Cologne, Germany**

TRUDI 2026 is a workshop bringing together users and developers of the Trixi Framework.  The program
will feature talks, tutorials, and a hackathon aimed at consolidating the existing community,
aligning long-term strategy, and advancing key features in high-performance scientific computing.

The event is co-hosted by [SNuBIC](snubic.qmd), the DFG
research unit on "Structure-preserving Numerical Methods for Bulk and Interface-Coupling of
Heterogeneous Models" (FOR5409).


**Contact:** [Gregor Gassner](mailto:ggassner@uni-koeln.de) or [Michael
